simpledb.remote

Class SimpleMetaData

  • java.lang.Object
    • simpledb.remote.ResultSetMetaDataAdapter
      • simpledb.remote.SimpleMetaData
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.sql.ResultSetMetaData, java.sql.Wrapper

    public class SimpleMetaData
extends ResultSetMetaDataAdapter
    An adapter class that wraps RemoteMetaData. Its methods do nothing except transform RemoteExceptions into SQLExceptions.
    Author:
    Edward Sciore
